arf.question
Class QuestionTrader

java.lang.Object
  arf.question.QuestionTrader

public final class QuestionTrader
extends java.lang.Object

The question trader manages all questions of the framework.

          Returns an instance of QuestionTrader class.

          Returns a question for the given name.

          Called when a question is stared and available by the framework.

public static QuestionTrader getInstance()
Returns an instance of QuestionTrader class.

Returns:

getQuestion

public Question getQuestion(java.lang.String name)
Returns a question for the given name.

Parameters:
name - The name of a question.
Returns:
The question. If no question was registered an UNKNOWN-question will be returned.

registerQuestion

Parameters:

unregisterQuestion

Called when a question is stopped and not available anymore by the framework.

Parameters:
question - The question.
